name: Project Lonesome
description:
This game was created as part of the Games Now! Online Game Jam 2020 with the given theme of Sadness.

The main idea behind the game is you as the player finding yourself being alone in a small city district accompanied by you pet. You roam around the play area for possible clues as to why there is no one else around.

The game is not a perfected and finished product. It is meant to test my limits of solo development during a limited amount of time available to me. I mainly pushed to see how well I could implement mechanics into the game and keep it playable. 

I am fairly satisfied with how the game ended up being as I am mostly self taught. This being my first official Game Jam that I took part in for which I was able to actually contribute something towards, I am happy with the results! The time constraints did slightly kick in too early so the game is lacking in a lot of content that I had been planning for it.

The game was created using Unity and all the Doodle Art was made with Pixilart (https://www.pixilart.com/).

Music from: Ultimate Game Music Collection (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/ultimate-game-music-collection-37351)

Doodle Art, Writing and Code by xZidene

Looking forward to future Game Jams and further improving my skills!
